targets.rawSql: SELECT i1 FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index DESC

panels.description: Magnitud y ángulo de corriente fase 1

targets.rawSql: SELECT i1angle FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index

panels.title: Magnitud y ángulo de corriente fase 1

targets.rawSql: SELECT i2 FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index

panels.description: Magnitud y ángulo de corriente fase 2

targets.rawSql: SELECT i2angle FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index LIMIT 1

panels.title: Magnitud y ángulo de corriente fase 2

targets.rawSql: SELECT i1 FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index

panels.description: Magnitud y ángulo de corriente fase 3

targets.rawSql: SELECT i3angle FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index

panels.title: Magnitud y ángulo de corriente fase 3

targets.rawSql: SELECT "in" FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index LIMIT 1
SELECT powerfactor1 FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index LIMIT 1
SELECT powerfactor2 FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index LIMIT 1
SELECT powerfactor3 FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index LIMIT 1

panels.description: Historial de Armónicos Fase 1, 2 y 3 en las últimas 24 horas

targets.rawSql: SELECT powerfactor1, powerfactor2, powerfactor3, time_index FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '1 day'::INTERVAL

panels.title: Factor de potencia de Fase 1, 2 y 3

targets.rawSql: SELECT reactiveenergyexport FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index
SELECT SUM(reactiveenergyexportday) FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '24 hours'::INTERVAL
SELECT reactiveenergyimport FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index
SELECT activepower FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '5 min'::INTERVAL ORDER BY time_index

panels.description: Historial de Armónicos Fase 1, 2 y 3 en las últimas 24 horas

targets.rawSql: SELECT activepower1, activepower2, activepower3, time_index FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '1 day'::INTERVAL

panels.title: Potencia Activa 1, 2 y 3

targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM(reactiveenergyexportday) FROM etsmartmeter WHERE time_index >= NOW() - '24 hours'::INTERVAL
